name: Acme Corp
description: Acme Corp provides automated workflow solutions for enterprise sales teams. Our platform integrates with existing CRM systems to streamline lead qualification and pipeline management.

name: GreenTech Solutions
description: GreenTech Solutions is developing novel carbon capture materials for industrial applications. Our proprietary MOFs (Metal-Organic Frameworks) offer 10x higher efficiency than current standards.

name: FinFlex
description: FinFlex offers API-first embedded finance solutions for marketplaces and SaaS platforms. Enable seamless lending, payments, and card issuing within your own product.

name: MediGen
description: MediGen leverages generative AI to accelerate drug discovery for rare genetic disorders. By simulating protein folding at scale, we reduce the time from target identification to clinical trials.

name: Nexus Dynamics
description: Autonomous micro-robotics for precision agriculture. Nexus Dynamics is building lightweight, swarm-capable robots to monitor soil health and apply targeted nutrients.

name: CyberShield AI
description: Zero-trust edge security powered by machine learning. CyberShield provides enterprise-grade protection against zero-day threats for distributed workforces.

name: NovaLearn
description: Adaptive learning paths for software engineering teams. NovaLearn upskills enterprise developers by generating custom coding challenges based on their codebase.

name: OrbitLogistics
description: Predictive supply chain routing using satellite imagery and alternative data. Orbit helps global shippers anticipate disruptions and reroute freight dynamically.

name: Aura Health
description: Aura Health is a comprehensive mental wellness platform offering personalized therapies, meditation guides, and anonymous peer support networks.

name: QuantumLeap
description: Developing room-temperature quantum computing architectures using novel topological insulators. QuantumLeap aims to bring quantum advantage to financial modeling.

name: Propeller Homes
description: Fractional real estate investing for Gen Z. Propeller allows users to invest in high-yield rental properties starting from just $100 using blockchain tokenization.

name: Synthetix Bio
description: Design studio for synthetic biology. We provide CAD-like software tools for genetic engineers to design, simulate, and compile custom DNA sequences.

name: Vela EV
description: Vela is building next-generation solid-state batteries for commercial electric vehicles, promising 2x range and 15-minute fast charging.

name: OmniChannel
description: Unified inventory management for independent brands selling across Shopify, Amazon, and physical retail. Prevent stockouts and automate reordering.

name: Kite Data
description: Kite Data provides a real-time vector database built for GenAI applications. Perform similarity searches on billions of vectors with sub-millisecond latency.

name: Harvesta
description: Vertical farming systems optimized via computer vision. Harvesta grows pesticide-free leafy greens using 95% less water than traditional agriculture.

name: Lumina
description: Financial OS for independent creators. Lumina handles automated tax withholding, expense tracking, and instant payouts for YouTube and TikTok creators.

name: SkyNet Defence
description: Orbital debris tracking and mitigation services for satellite operators. SkyNet uses ground-based lasers and AI to predict and prevent collisions in LEO.

name: Petal
description: Usage-based pet insurance. Petal uses IoT wearable data to offer personalized, dynamic premiums for dog and cat owners based on their pet's activity lifestyle.

name: ConstructAI
description: Automated estimation software for commercial contractors. Upload floor plans and ConstructAI generates accurate material takeoffs and cost estimates in seconds.
